Tech Innovators.description: A group of tech enthusiasts and professionals who meet to discuss the latest trends in technology and innovation.

Creative Minds.description: A group of creative individuals who gather to share ideas and work on artistic projects.

Fitness Enthusiasts.description: A group of fitness lovers who meet to work out and share tips on healthy living.

Business Networkers.description: A group of business professionals who meet to network and discuss business strategies.
Business Networkers.daily_activity: networking and discussing strategies from 18:00 to 19:00
